channel.title: Announce in world chat when I get a rare drop
channel.description:
Hey! So before saying anything else, I have been googleing, none of the methods wokred for me, they all gave me tons of errors!
What I need is to setup so that when a player gets a drop prefrebly a rare one, it announces that in the chat like the yell function but its own one, like a server broadcast. Could someone help me with this? im on a 667 source [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2ef2fjp.jpg[/img]
Also tried doing this but it didnt work either Settings.java [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/88pTBdr.png[/img]
NPC.Java [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jktMh99.png[/img]
Source COmplier Error [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jgX2yUc.png[/img]

item.title: Announce in world chat when I get a rare drop
item.dc:creator: @Roar337 Roar337
item.description:
@Roar337 wrote:

sk8r those are warnings they should not inhibit compiling your client although you may want to look into that anyways it might cause some unintended function

Read full topic
item.source: Announce in world chat when I get a rare drop

item.title: Announce in world chat when I get a rare drop
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Your errors are because:

  1. You don’t have a Settings class, or you didn’t import it
  2. You don’t have a “sendWorldMessage” method in the World class.

Your “Source compiler error” in the picture with green text actually looks to be a Client related error.
And those errors are because you’re adding null parameters to methods.

Read full topic
item.source: Announce in world chat when I get a rare drop
